Text:
Thx!!
Love these oldies, got any more? Be sure to post them :)
At About 46:20, the AR changes from 4:3 to 16:9 (albeit 16:9 with black borders on the side). Whoever did the encoding was smoking something at the time.
And on the credits the announcer gives a promo on upcoming shows on BBC3, ie, this is a TV rip.
